messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/9/2003 2:18:38 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes: > >Marji, spoken in a rather forceful,
> un-Marji-like way.
>
> Aaaw...thanks Marji! Sierra wants to hang with Liam really bad too! She
> gets this sweet smile whenever I mention him.
>
> I've just decided that I'm going to act like I'm going, I'm setting my
> desire out and trusting that the universe will respond appropriately. Money or no,
> I'll be there!!!:)
>
> Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
